item.description:
Games night at my home at 7 pm, includes twister! Bring any games you'd like to play - And weather permitting, campfire trivia and/or sing along!  (Bring instruments if you want), and any ideas you may have for campfire fun. BYOB and some snacks provided (bring more if you like).  

Was hoping to do a day trip earlier this day, but as leaves are still not changing, this is cancelled.  It promises to be a beautiful day and nice night!  Watch the site in case I decide to start a bit earlier for some bocci ball.  Lots of other good stuff going on all day too elsewhere, but look forward to seeing eveyone at 7 no matter what!
item.name: Twister, campfire and games!!!
